price: Da erhörten Wir ihn und erretteten ihn aus dem Kummer. So retten Wir die Gläubigen.
arabic: فَٱسۡتَجَبۡنَا لَهُۥ وَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُ مِنَ ٱلۡغَمِّۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُـۨجِي ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: fa-is'tajabnā lahu wanajjaynāhu mina al-ghami wakadhālika nunjī al-mu'minīna
